synopsis.text:
Rokurou Okajima, now known as Rock, finds himself thrust into the gritty underworld of Roanapur after being abandoned by his former employers. As a member of the Lagoon Company, a ruthless group of mercenary pirates, Rock must navigate the treacherous waters of the criminal underworld alongside his volatile co-worker, Revy. When a series of murders threatens to disrupt the fragile balance of power in the city, Rock becomes entangled in a brutal war between the mafia and the enigmatic killers known as Hansel and Gretel.

As the violence escalates, Rock struggles to reconcile his past life as a salaryman with his new reality as a member of the Lagoon crew. With his moral compass tested at every turn, Rock must decide whether to embrace his new life or risk everything to return to his old one. As he becomes further embroiled in the power struggle between Hotel Moscow and the Lagoon Company, Rock's choices will have lasting consequences for himself and the crew who have become his family. With danger lurking around every corner, Rock must find the strength to survive in a world where only the strongest and most ruthless can thrive.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
